lead_paragraph: The scale of the mysterious activity in the last week, which wiped out and restored billions of dollars in value, is baffling even veteran investors.

headline.print_headline: Wild Trade in 3 Stocks Confounds Hong Kong
headline.main: Frenetic Trading of 3 Stocks Confounds Hong Kong Market

snippet: The scale of the mysterious activity in the last week, which wiped out and restored billions of dollars in value, is baffling even veteran investors.
abstract: Wild trading in Goldin Properties, Goldin Financial and Hanergy Thin Film Power Group on Chinese stock market has baffled even veteran investors; Goldin Properties lost and then recovered billions of dollars in value after its stock fell 40 percent and then rose by 43 percent in less than one week; neither companies nor regulators have offered explanation for volatility.
